reviewText: You're not going to learn a whole lot from this documentary if you've already seen one or two other documentaries on the subject,  but the people were interesting, some were really fun, some were just horror geeks, and some were completely laughable. It interviewed fang makers, vampire guides, vampire L.A.R.Pers, people into suspension/blood play and illusionists.  All in all, if you're obsessed with the genre, buy it. I had fun watching it, I just wish there was some bonus material, or extras.
